value.title: How to make your data searchable with Azure Search and AI | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to make your data searchable with Azure Search and AI. Creating compelling search experiences is hard. Azure Search provides search as a service and makes it easy to let AI analyze your data and enhance your results.    For more tips and tricks,

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Analyze images
value.excerpt: Analyze images

value.title: Track wild polar bears with AI
value.excerpt: Detect and track polar bears through photos using AI, then use Power BI to show where polar bears are being spotted.

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

value.title: Create a knowledge store with Azure Cognitive Search
value.excerpt: Learn how to persist the output from an Azure Cognitive Search enrichment pipeline for independent analysis or downstream processing.

value.title: Create production workloads on Azure Databricks with Azure Data Factory
value.excerpt: Create production workloads on Azure Databricks with Azure Data Factory

value.title: Classify endangered bird species with Custom Vision
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cognitive Services Custom Vision to build a machine learning model that identifies the species of a bird in an image, to help with gathering data.

value.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data
value.excerpt: Use convolutional neural networks and recurrent neural networks to analyze and predict images and text with TensorFlow and Keras.

value.title: Introduction to Anomaly Detector
value.excerpt: Discover the Anomaly Detector service that is part of the Azure Decision services offerings.

value.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based platform for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

value.title: Introduction to Form Recognizer
value.excerpt: Form Recognizer provides your software with automated data identification and extraction from your documents. Using an SDK or REST, the AI-powered service decreases, or can completely eliminate, time spent on and errors in data entry, while also making it easier to utilize your data.

value.title: Introduction to Text-to-speech
value.excerpt: Text-to-speech converts text into human-like speech, along with the ability to create a unique, custom voice to use in your applications. We introduce the different types of voices, how to use them, and review situations when they are appropriate to use.

value.title: Process streaming data with Azure Databricks structured streaming
value.excerpt: Process streaming data with Azure Databricks structured streaming

value.title: Recognize entities in text with the text analytics API
value.excerpt: Identify and categorize entities in your text as people, places, organizations, date/time, quantities, percentages, currencies, and more.

value.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
value.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

value.excerpt: Learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning.
